metadata.dc:author: Saurat, J H
Barrade, A
Puissant, A
Noury-Duperrat, G
Dalanoe, J
metadata.dc:description: An erythema annulare-like lesion following the intramuscular injection of a suspension of estrogen and progestative mixture in purified olive oil is described by the authors. The eruption appeared 9-10 days after the injection and relapsed after each injection. The histological picture was compatible with erythema annulare.
metadata.dc:title: Eritema anular centrífugo en los puntos dy inyección de preparados hormonales en suspensión oleosa
[Anular centrifugal erythema on the site of injection of hormone preparation in oil suspension].
